channel.title: New Kaiju on the Block.
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "New Kaiju on the Block." - Just completed the impossible mission and got my kaiju approved

item.title: New Kaiju on the Block.
item.content:encoded:
Hi folks, just wanted to let you wiki folks know to add Lord Nuke (myself) to the list of players who've completed the IM. I can also furnish the details on my kaiju for you if you need them.
Lord Nuke - Kage of Daikaiju Village, Kage of Neo Kaiju Village (IR)
